definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)

sentences.english: It was taken in Bromo National park.
sentences.chinese: 它拍摄于婆罗摩国家公园。

sentences.english: This color composite view was recorded under dark skies near Sydney, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 这张彩色合成影像是在澳洲的雪梨附近所拍摄。

sentences.english: This part try to find the Tornatore's habits of direction and personal characteristics from the video shoot.
sentences.chinese: 从短片中找寻托纳托雷的拍摄习惯和个人导演特色。

sentences.english: The American public has yet to see the Zapruder film.
sentences.chinese: 美国民众还没有看到撒氏拍摄的影片。

sentences.english: The mound was not visible in an ASTER image acquired in late 2008.
sentences.chinese: 这块高地在2008年底拍摄的图片中还看没有。

sentences.english: What they do is they film bowlers.
With a digital camera, check the images as you shoot.
sentences.chinese: 如果是数码相机，拍摄完就要检查一下。

sentences.english: The picture was recorded from an Alpine mountain pass not far from Turin, Italy.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片是在离意大利都灵不远的一条山道上拍摄的。

sentences.english: The home-plate camera filmed through the backstop.
sentences.chinese: 家板相机拍摄，通过逆止。

sentences.english: My basic game plan was to try and reduce the incoming light to the absolute minimum.
sentences.chinese: 我拍摄的基本计划是尽量的减少进光量。

sentences.english: Position yourself so subjects are no farther than ten feet away.
sentences.chinese: 使自己与拍摄对象之间的距离不超过十英尺。

sentences.english: Draft a script to guide your shoot.
sentences.chinese: 草拟一个脚本用于指导你的拍摄。

sentences.english: In addition to cutaways, we also explain physics.
sentences.chinese: 除了拍摄剖面图以外，我们也解释物理学。

sentences.english: Pictures are transfered instantly to the Reuters editing system.
sentences.chinese: 拍摄后，照片会被立即传送到路透社的编辑系统中。

sentences.english: But I don't feel confident enough delegating that much work on a film set.
sentences.chinese: 我不觉得我有足够的信心在电影拍摄场去布置工作。

sentences.english: I’ve watched and filmed him for years.
sentences.chinese: 我都观察拍摄它好多年了。

definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
to choose a location/to frame a shot (for filming, photography etc)
to document on film the course of events/to follow sb with a camera
camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
cast and crew/performers and production team
to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
